attributes.action: Get child soldiers onto the national curriculum
attributes.additional_details:
After doing many questionaires we realised that not many people actually understood the full concept of 'child soldiers' this, we feel, is a real issue.
The use of child soldiers is affecting children our age and even younger. We have the opportunity to go to school, get qualifications and have a chance in life,yet those used as child soldiers in modern day conflict don't. This is unfair, if you agree we need to raise awarness by putting it on the national curriculum please sign this e petetion.
